phrases: Hey, all you viewers out there!
When you are watchin' Fairy Tail, make sure to keep the room nice and bright,
and sit back from the screen,'kay?
You are the one who said he wanted to ride!
I will yell it out countless times.
I believe your every tomorrow will be shining.
And that is why we are not going to lose!
When it seems like you will be blown away by the headwinds,
grasp this hand, try to take a chance.
Because you are not alone anymore, got it?
Do not give up on your awesome dream!
That is right, do not cry!
Now, with the light shining down upon you.
Do not even think about something like giving up!
Even if you trade being hurt again for strength.
Your eyes, always looking straight ahead,
It is the most popular tourist spot in the Kingdom, located by the sea.
There is a giant amusement park and a five-star hotel next door.
There is a beach which will keep you coming back again and again.
And then there is the sea expanding out to the infinite horizon...
Using the tickets they received from Loke,
Natsu and the others are visiting and having some excellent time off.
I said, Do not use Happy to cover yourself up!
There is no such thing as freedom in this world...
I really do feel more at ease while I am in armor.
There is no help for a woman like me...
Want to go have some fun downstairs?
Natsu and Gray are already down there.
They wanted to go win some games!
They have a place like that, do not they?
Um, maybe that is a little too flashy...
Sometimes taking a day to pamper myself... is not such a bad thing.
You have got to be kiddin' me!
Boy, let me tell you something.
There is only two paths that men can travel.
Or stop and meet your end.
I heard that Phantom was disbanded.
Juvia is now a Free Wizard.
So I take it you want to join Fairy Tail, then?
Well, I do not mind, but I am not sure what the master would say.
I would not say that so lightly if I were you.
I guess the parade has started outside.
I am really on a roll today.
I have a feeling that I will not lose no matter who I am up against.
Then... why do not we play a special game?
Let us play a game where your life's on the line, Erza-neesan...
It is been quite a while, Sister.
You think I will tell you?
I will not allow you to lay a finger on Gray-sama.
Danger is closing in around Erza-san.
So I can clean up here?
Do not give me that, you...
The people are in the cards!
I can use it now too, Sister.
We were your friends too once...
That is... until you betrayed us, Sister.
Do not abuse Erza so much, Sho.
A man who is a dandy should keep his emotions in check.
You grew a pretty hot body there.
I suppose it is not surprising you would not recognize me.
Back then, when I was called Mad Dog Wally,
I was a lot more... rough around the edges.
Once you get the hang of it, anyone can use magic.
And why are they calling you their sister?
I am not actually their sister.
We were all together in the past.
But have not you been in Fairy Tail since you were really young?
How about we go home, Sister?
Unless you do what we say...
You did it the right way?
Hey, where are you taking Erza?
If you guys were up against Natsu or Gray they would blow you away real quick!
Sorry, but they are the ones that got blown away.
In another five minutes your body'll be completely bent backwards.
Speaking of which, Milliana, I have a present for you.
Milliana, we are counting on you.
You are coming back... to the Tower of Heaven!
I just know that Jellal will be pleased!
Argh, I am going to bust outta this thing!
Gate of the Giant Crab, I open thee!
Is it because of this rope?
Yeah, see, since I cannot get out, I was trying to prick it with this paper knife.
We might be able to get free!
The knife from inside the card poked me?
Hey, I do not know why, but that means that stuff from inside the card can affect the outside!
Then does my knife look like it is sticking out?
But if I felt pain, then its force can be felt outside!
Trying cutting my rope with that knife!
Whatever, just get on with it!
Next, it is your turn to...
I will come back and save you, I promise!
Hey, get a hold of yourself!
I will fix you up, promise!
It is you, one of the Element 4!
She is not our enemy anymore.
After it got dark all of a sudden, I figured I would leave a double and see how things turned out, but...
In order for him not to be discovered by the enemy, Juvia protected Gray-sama in her Water Lock.
And thanks to your meddling, he got away!
Lucy, where is Natsu and the others?
I do not know about Natsu, but Happy and Erza have been...
Is it normal to go shooting people in the mouth?
A guy could get hurt really bad!
Um, normal people would be totally KOed.
I will not let him escape!
Sure, but where did they go?
He is got a nose on him that would put animals to shame.
Lord Jellal, I am here to report that they have captured Erza and are heading here now.
Why have you let that traitor live until now?
With your magical power, you should have been able to dispose of her easily.
The world would be too boring a place.
However, now that the Tower of Heaven is complete, allowing her to live would cause issues.
You will become a living sacrifice to our aspiration, Erza Scarlet.
Inside a ship heading toward the Tower of Heaven.
I do not plan to resist.
Because you are a traitor, Sister.
Milliana's tubes have the power of sealing magic.
You cannot do anything about them on your own.
No matter how powerful you are, Sister.
Then would you at least allow me to requip into armor?
I am afraid... to return to that tower...
Unless I am wearing armor... the fear...
But you look good in that dress, Sister.
I did not want to do this...
Sho, do not be so loud!
Erza, if we do not hurry, they will find us.
What they do to the kids that are found out...
Do not worry, there is nothing to be afraid of.
We are going to get our freedom.
Since Happy's been kidnapped, this time I am doing the preview all by myself!
So, calling to order the first Plan to Save Happy and Erza meeting!
Barge in through the front door and blow away the enemy!
All right, let us do this!
You will understand when you are older.
That does not make any sense.
